item.title: James add a quote by Hubert Selby Jr.
item.description:
"Why did you start to write?
I left at 15.. I started to write becase I was taken off a ship from Germany when I was 18. They said I wouldn't live for 6 months.
I'd been given up for dead many times and I just didn't want to waste my life. I had what I now realize was a spiritual experience.
I realized that I would die, and that just before I would die, two things would happen.
number one, I would regret my entire life. and number two, I would want to live my life over again. and then I would die. and that terrified me.
[...]
to think that I would live my entire life, look at it, and say oh..I blew it. was such a terrifying thought that I bought a typewriter
I didn't know what I was going to do with it, but I bought a typewriter. but that is what got me to start writing, was
I did not want to waste my life
I wanted to, and I HAD to, do something with my life" -- Hubert Selby Jr.
